data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Leiva, Sergio, Fernandez, Nestor, Theron, Pieter, Rollard, Christine (2013): Agistemus aimogastaensis sp. n. (Acari, Actinedida, Stigmaeidae), a recently discovered predator of eriophyid mites Aceria oleae and Oxycenus maxwelli, in olive orchards in Argentina. ZooKeys 312: 65-78, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.312.5520, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.312.5520
